title: word-color
body:
Color your words! Similar words have Similar color.

## Usage

```
$ spm install afc163/word-color
```

```js
require('afc163/word-color/1.0.0/word-color');

wordColor('words');     // rgb(188,164,18)
```
html:
Color your words! Similar words have Similar color.

Usage

require('afc163/word-color/1.0.0/word-color');

wordColor('words');     // rgb(188,164,18)
